item.title: Marcopolo Paradiso G4 1400 Multichasis v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 22, 2025

Marcopolo Paradiso G4 1400 Multichasis v1.0 ETS2

6 chassis, Mercedes Scania Leito – Executive, Volvo Leito – Executive, Mercedes Leito – Executive
30 chassis paints + 10 chassis skin edits
22 upper signals
Floors
Curtains
5 smoke levels
Smoke for each chassis
Wheel particle levels
Accessories with physics (cabin – exterior)
Animated air conditioning fan
Custom wheels per chassis
Much more

Credits: CD3D

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: SCANIA BODE WAGNER LIMA V2 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 22, 2025

SCANIA BODE WAGNER LIMA V2 1.55 ETS2

The Scania Bode Wagner Lima V2 V1.55 is a specific and highly-detailed truck mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2).

Here’s a breakdown of what that means:
Scania Bode: “Bode” is a popular Brazilian nickname for the classic Scania 113H truck. The mod is a recreation of this iconic truck model.
Wagner Lima V2: This indicates that the mod was created by the popular modder Wagner Lima, and this is the second version he has released.

V1.55 ETS2 : This is the most crucial part for compatibility. It means this particular version of the mod is designed to work with the 1.55 update of Euro Truck Simulator 2.

The mod is known for its high quality and realism, and it typically includes a detailed 3D model, custom sounds, realistic chassis options, and a wide range of customization features.

Credits: WAGNER LIMA

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: MAPA BAHIA Full v2.7 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 22, 2025

MAPA BAHIA Full v2.7 ETS2

The MAPA BAHIA V2.7 FULL is a popular map mod for the game Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2).
This mod was created by a Brazilian modder, Reinaldo Santos, and it adds the entire state of Bahia to the game. It is a highly detailed and realistic recreation that includes the state’s main cities, highways, and unique landscapes.
The “V2.7 FULL” designation means you are looking for the complete, updated version of the map mod. This version typically includes all the latest features, bug fixes, and is compatible with a specific version of ETS2, so it’s important to make sure the mod matches your game version (e.g., 1.50 or 1.55).

Key features of this map mod include:
A realistic road network with challenging and scenic routes.
Unique local landmarks and urban environments.
The ability to explore different regions of Bahia, from coastal areas to the interior.

Credits: ROTAS

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Busscar Jum buss 380 Volvo B10M v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 22, 2025

Busscar Jum buss 380 Volvo B10M v1.0 ETS2

Yes, the **Busscar Jum Buss 380 with Volvo B10M chassis** is a popular mod for **Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2)**. It is a community-made mod, not an official part of the game. This mod is well-known for its high level of detail and is a favorite among players who enjoy bus routes, especially on Brazilian maps.

Key features of this mod typically include:
– A detailed 3D model of the Busscar Jum Buss 380.
– A realistic interior with animated buttons and functional doors.
– Custom sounds that accurately mimic the Volvo B10M engine.
– Various paint jobs (**skins**) for different bus companies.

Keep in mind that since it’s a mod, its functionality can depend on the current version of ETS2 you’re running. Modders regularly release updates to ensure compatibility with the latest game patches. You can often find versions of this mod on modding websites and in the descriptions of YouTube videos that showcase it.

Credits: GRAFIATO

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
